name: Elystia
description:
After centuries of prosperity and balance, Elystia, the soul Crystal, destined to bring the souls of the desceased to the Other Side has been mysteriously broken. Condemned to stay in a world that is not theirs, the lost souls slowly begin to fall into madness, spreading ruine and death.

At the dawn of the end of the world, incarnate Mara, a young sorecess, one of the few survivors of her academy, in a quest to bring peace to the lost souls and recover the broken fragments of Elystia to renew the link between Life and Death.

Use your shapeshifter magic skills to progress, defeat your ennemies and save what remains of this ruined world.
